ds.util
Class InorderIterator<T>

java.lang.Object
  ds.util.InorderIterator<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.Iterator<T>
public class InorderIterator<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Iterator<T>

This class is partial implementation of an Iterator that produces an iterative inorder scan of the elements in a binary tree specified by a TNode reference root. The class implements the methods hasNext and next but does not provide an implementation for the remove method.

The implementation provides a model for the STree and TreeSet, iterators.

Constructor Summary
InorderIterator(TNode<T> root)
          Creates an InorderIterator positioned at the left-most element in the binary tree.
